LanguageData.VPE_SpeedBoost.label: arcane agility
LanguageData.VPE_SpeedBoost.description: Magically induced agility boost, greatly increasing movement speed.
LanguageData.VPE_BladeFocus.description: Magically induced combat focus, greatly enhancing melee combat capabilities.
LanguageData.VPE_FiringFocus.label: ranger focus
LanguageData.VPE_FiringFocus.description: Magically induced combat focus, greatly enhancing ranged combat capabilities.
LanguageData.VPE_AdrenalineRush.label: arcane rush
LanguageData.VPE_AdrenalineRush.description: Magically induced adrenaline rush, increasing sight, hearing and movement capabilities.
LanguageData.VPE_ControlledFrenzy.label: arcane frenzy
LanguageData.VPE_ControlledFrenzy.description: Temporary, magically induced frenzy. The energy restores itself with each consecutive kill.
